name: Ultima VI : The False Prophet
description: This installer uses the GoG installer (as of 2020-04-29) and DosBox.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/innoextract-1.8/innoextract-1.8-linux.tar.xz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxULTIMA6.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosboxULTIMA6_single.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxULTIMA6.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxULTIMA6.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
main_file: DOSBOX/dosboxULTIMA6_single.conf
